sentences.en: A nuclear fusion is a thermonuclear reaction.
sentences.cn: 核聚变是一种热核反应.

sentences.en: In this age of thermonuclear technology , neither view can assure man's preservation.
sentences.cn: 在当今的热核技术时代, 这两种观点都不足以保障人类的生存.

sentences.en: It could carry a single thermonuclear warhead with a maximum explosive force of 50 kilotons.
sentences.cn: 它可以携带最多为50千吨爆发力单一热核弹头.

sentences.en: Laurie Juspeczyk: Jon thinks that there gonna be thermonuclear war.
sentences.cn: 劳丽: “乔认为这里将会发生核战争. ”

sentences.en: Systems of this sort are being used in an effort to produce controlled thermonuclear fusion reactions.
sentences.cn: 这类系统正用于产生受控热核聚变反应的探索.

sentences.en: Thermonuclear reactions are, quite literally, nuclear burning.
sentences.cn: 热核反应, 通俗地说, 就是原子核燃烧.

sentences.en: Thermonuclear weapons have high destructive power.
sentences.cn: 热核武器拥有惊人的杀伤力.

sentences.en: They have nothing to do with the design of thermonuclear warhead.
sentences.cn: 他们]与热核武器弹头的设计毫无关系.

sentences.en: We did work in thermonuclear energy, laser beam refraction, hydrogen molecule development, and heavy - water computer data.
sentences.cn: 我们从事过热核能 、 激光束折射, 氛分子发展和电脑重水数据的研究工作.

phrases.tran_cn: 热核融合；热核熔合；热核反应；热核聚变

trans.tran_en: thermonuclear weapons use a  nuclear  reaction, involving the splitting of atoms, to produce very high temperatures and a very powerful explosion
